application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 24 (Drainage Strategy) of planning permission reference 24843/APP/2022/2403, dated 11-06-2024, for the 'erection of building comprising 105 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) and 99sq.m (GIA) Community Hub (flexible Use Class E/F.1/F.2), ranging from two to seven storeys together with associated accesses, car parking, cycle parking and hard and soft landscaping (REVISED PLANS 23.11.22).'
decision_conditions: The Applicant has failed to provide an appropriately detailed drainage strategy to demonstrate the development would not increase the risk of flooding in accordance with Policy SI 12 of the London Plan (2021) and Policy DMEI 10 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020).
